sentence.Network_en: Outer perianth segments dark brownish - red, short lanceolate, with whitish edge.
sentence.Network_cn: 外花被片段为深棕红色, 短披针形, 带白色边缘.

sentence.Network_en: Leaves alternate, oblong or oblong - lanceolate, 2 - 5 cm long, 1 - 1.5 cm wide.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶互生, 长圆形或长圆状披针形, 长 2-5 厘米, 宽 1-1.5 厘米.

sentence.Network_en: Leaves linear to lanceolate , thin and soft, gradually tapered end of branch.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶线形或披针形, 薄而且软, 在枝条的末端缓尖.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...先端钝圆，横向较宽，似肾形。类似叶片的形状的植物还有积雪草，冬葵等。细辛属叶片的形状多种多样，大小不同，形状各异。但就一种植物来讲，叶片的形态还是比较稳定的，可作为识别植物的分类依据。因此其他类型的叶片形状还包括，针形(acicular或acerose)，线形(linear)，披针形(lanceolate)，椭圆形(elliptical)，卵形(ovate)，菱形(rhomboidal)，心形(cordate)，肾形(reniform)等。叶尖的形状主要有，渐尖(acuminate)，急尖(acut

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from late Latin lanceolatus, from Latin lanceola, diminutive of lancea 'a lance'

means.word_mean: 1. of a leaf shape; shaped like a lance head; narrow and tapering to a pointed apex
